## Western baltic cod
```{r, message=FALSE}
require(fishvice)
require(ggplot2)
rbx <- read_sam(directory="WBcod_2015_short", from_web = TRUE)
ices_standard_graph(rbx$rby)
blob <- fishvice:::sam_process_error(rbx$rbya)
```

## North sea cod
```{r, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE}
rbx <- read_sam(directory="nscod2015-base6", from_web = TRUE)
ices_standard_graph(rbx$rby)
blob <- sam_process_error(rbx$rbya, plot_it=TRUE)
blob$mass
```
